headline: Masco Corporation Announces Date for Earnings Release and Conference Call for 2025 Third Quarter
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., September 30, 2025--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS) announced today that it will hold a conference call regarding 2025 third quarter results on Wednesday, October 29 at 8:00 a.m. ET. The conference call will be hosted by Masco President and Chief Executive Officer Jon Nudi. Participants in the call are asked to register five to ten minutes prior to the scheduled start time by dialing (800) 549-8228 or (289) 819-1520. Please use the conference identification number 16464.
